title: Identify the Structure
text: He should think about a structure that organizes data in a grid format, similar to a spreadsheet.

title: Consider Common Data Structures
text: He should consider common data structures used in programming and data analysis, such as arrays, lists, and tables.

title: Focus on Rows and Columns
text: He should focus on the fact that the data is organized in rows and columns, which is a key characteristic of a table-like structure.

title: Think About Data Analysis Tools
text: He should think about tools used in data analysis that handle data in a tabular format, such as those used in Python or R.

title: Select the Correct Term
text: He should select the term that is commonly used to describe a collection of data organized in rows and columns, often used in data analysis.
